column5: Well, I had a little time on my hands today and started to figure out the new camera/software.  I wanted to share this with all my friends here.  Poppa's Pride & Joy......................  <iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/oe4iGWWlxBQ" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>  Little Leah will be fishing with Poppa this summer
OH, HOW CUTE she is.....and MUCH better looking then Grandpa.....
Cutie...  Put your salmon in front of her and they might look big...lol
Thats awesome. Your granddaughter is a cutie.  I am sure she will love fishing with ya to. My daughter is asking me already.

Definitely a cutie! Such a peaceful, beautiful video. I have a video of my son being baptized and he's screaming like the priest is dipping his head in boiling acid LOL! I showed him the video the other day and he started crying again, said "why I am I wearing a dress?!!"
Dang Simon !!!!! She is a keeper Thanks for sharing that. She is just the cutest
she is absolutely adorable...i can relate to being a proud Poppa...with your approval ill post a video i made of my "Lil Bean" a few years ago ...  Great Job!
Some thing for my OFC friends .......... i was just checking to see if i fit in here any where . Very nice to see Baptisums going on in familys still . She is a sweet heart Simon .
Nothing like family's special moments to give us perspective.  Congrsta Simon
Thanks for sharing that great video Poppaslayer Little Leah is definitely an angel

Thanks for the kind comments all. Yep, she's a cutie all right. I bought her first rod the day she was born 10.10.10. For Christmas a proper sized PFD. I figure Leah will be ready for panfish off the dock in September when the bugs start to disappear. Assuming we can keep her out of the water ( no fear)  Regards, Simon
Now that was priceless! Good job my friend!
you are welcome to fish off the dock with us any time buddy!  just make sure I'm there too!
Shes a cutie Simon  , im sure she will be outfishing you in no time
